div.p: The allowed codes for identifying the ISO 11179 data element concept if intended for registration/use within the U.S. Structured Data Capture (SDC) project.

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://snomed.info/sct

publisher.value: Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT
